snippet.title: Faces of Rome Live Action Trailer / Total War™: ROME 2
snippet.description:
The official live action trailer for Total War™: ROME II - coming to PC A.D. MMXIII. 

Total War™: Rome II will sink players into the dangerous political machinations of Rome's senate, while asking them to struggle with family dilemmas and question the loyalty of 'friends' and allies.

Leading the greatest army ever seen into battle will be just one challenge you will face at the head of the world's first superpower.

Will you help forge an empire? Restore the Republic? Or grasp the reins of power for yourself, and assume the hated title of tyrant? Who will you conquer? Who will you betray? Who will you sacrifice?

"How far will you go for Rome?"
